Name: Asha
About the game: Asha was a great warrior in life, and like all great warriors, she had a great death, having been defeated by her great rival, Kaira the piercing blade. After a long struggle, Kaira's blade pierced her body and Asha fell to the ground, then darkness surrounded her. In the darkness the smell of grass fills the environment, Asha gets up out of the earth, lifting the grass in the process, she feels the heat of the sun and soon realizes, she is in Valhalla. Talk to Valhalla's warriors to learn about them, and hear the stories of their lives being told by Bragi, the god of music and poetry Defeat all Valhalla warriors to become the champion of the gods. Each warrior has his own combat style, each battle is unique To defeat the warriors you can count on the help of the Norse gods, such as Thor and Balder Becoming the champion of Valhalla is an achievement only for the truly strong, will you be able to accomplish such an achievement?
Meta Title: Asha: Oct 26, 2022, UnderLight and Full Overview
